description: Ms. codex. Title from inscription on fol. 1a. Physical description: Written in black ink with use of red (see records for each text). Contains tables. Dark cream paper with thick laid lines and pulp visible. Magical(?) square on fol. 1a. Inscription in Western numerals in black ink on the upper left corner of the upper cover (corresponds to Brill's list. See Houtsma, M. Th. Catalogue d'une collection de manuscrits arabes et turcs, no. 502). Origin: Last text apparently completed at the end of Shawwāl 661 [Sept. 1263] in Khwārazm (see end of text, fol. 51a). It is not clear whether this date applies to the redaction of the text or to the copy. Several dated inscriptions on fol. 1a and 51b, the earliest dated Shawwāl 988 H. [1580] (fol. 1a).
author: Kūshyār, -approximately 961
abstract: Collection of treatises on astrology/nomy and arithmetics.
contents: 2. fol. 46a: Faṣl fī maʻrifat ṭulūʻ al-Shiʻrá.
3. fol. 46a-51a: Risālah laṭīfah fī ḥisāb / Sharaf al-millah wa-al-dīn Abū ʻAlī Maḥmūd ibn Muḥammad al-Jaghmīnī.
extent: 51 leaves: paper ; 192 x 147 mm. bound to 192 x 152 mm.

title.@value: كتاب مدخل كوشيار ورسالة في الحساب
Kitāb Madkhal Kūshyār wa-Risālah fī al-ḥisāb.

provenance: Several inscriptions on fol. 1a and 51b, including ownership statements. Fol. 1a: ownership statement in the name of ʻAnbar al-Ḥ---ī al-mīqātī (dated 15 Shawwāl 988 [Nov. 23, 1580]) ; ʻAlā al-Dīn ibn(?) Nāṣir al-Dīn al-Ṭarābulusī al-Ḥanafī (dated 1016 H. [1607 or 8], price: 30) ; one erased except for the word "al-Mīqātī" (dated Rabīʻ al-Awwal 989 [April-May 1581]), written in the hand of(?) Shaykh Sulaymān al-Falakī ; inscription "1226" H. [1811 or 12]. Fol. 51b: partly crossed out waṣiyah dated 997 H. [1588 or 9] ; ownership statement with name obliterated except for the words "al-Shāmī al-mīqātī" (dated "Rabī al-Awwal sanah [no date]"). Waqf (see inscriptions on margins of fol. 1b-2a). Acquired by Robert Garrett from Brill, Leyden, 1900.
creator: Kūshyār, -approximately 961
كوشيار
subject: Astronomy, Arab—10th century
binding_note: Paper over paper pasteboards for upper and lower covers. Brown leather spine and edges. Paper pastedowns.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
